summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.0°C) and outside temperature (down 5.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 723 m), rainfall (up 0.2 mm), and light levels (up 9936 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), light levels (up 11734 lux), and cloud levels (up 1671 m) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 723.4m lower than yesterday, 650.2m lower than the past week, 1670.5m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1000.8m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Showers, occasional overcast conditions, and a mix of sun and clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
